paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted pathogenic germline BRCA2 mutations and penetrance data from a study on Chinese NSCLC patients.

functional_data.summary: The majority of the pathogenic BRCA2 variants were frameshift mutations (57.2%).

variants.additional_notes: No specific individual-level penetrance data was provided.
key_quotes: Results revealed a gBRCA2 predominance with 49 (76.6%) gBRCA2 LOF mutation carriers.
Among the pathogenic gBRCA2 variants, we observed four types of mutations, with frameshift mutations being the most predominant mutation type accounting for 57.2% (28/49).

extraction_metadata.notes: No individual-level penetrance data was available.
